description.value:
Access You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

You're used to fighting and hiding in a haze of smoke and flame. You automatically succeed at the @Check[flat|dc:5] to target a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] creature if that creature is concealed only by smoke. When you are concealed or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] in smoke, increase the DC of the flat check to target you to 6 if you're concealed or 12 if you're hidden.
